pages.text: A varied diet is a great way to increase your health.$(br2)Each nourishing food item eaten will add progress to your next heart, with larger meals giving much more progress.$(br2)Complimenting this, there is a massive amount of new foods available. Most can be seen by typing $(2)'@farmer'$(), $(2)'@croptopia'$() and $(2)'@pam's'$() into JEI.

But beware, each item you eat is placed on a list with a limited length. Once the item has been pushed off the list by newer eaten items, you will lose the health progress gained from it.$(br2)Avoid the negative effects from this by constantly eating more diverse foods, there are plenty to choose from.$(br2)You can monitor your food history and check your progress towards your next health increase by pressing $(2)'N'$()
